Package ch.obermuhlner.jhuge.converter

Converters to serialize objects into byte array representation and deserialize back into objects.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Converter<T>
    Converts an object into a serialized form and from the serialized form back into an object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassLoaderObjectInputStream
    Special ObjectInputStream using a specific ClassLoader to create object instances.
    CompactConverter<T extends java.io.Serializable>
    Uses a customized compact representation to serialize an object and back.
    Converters
    Convenience methods to access different Converter implementations.
    IntegerConverter
    Converts an Integer into a serialized form and from the serialized form back into an Integer.
    LongConverter
    Converts an Long into a serialized form and from the serialized form back into an Long.
    SerializableConverter<T extends java.io.Serializable>
    Uses Java serialization to convert an object into a serialized representation and back.

Package ch.obermuhlner.jhuge.converter Description

Converters to serialize objects into byte array representation and deserialize back into objects.
